entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for `$(TargetFrameworks)` per `$(RuntimeIdentifier)` (RID) #37830
  • [Workload Sets] ensure that users can get a full listing of all installed workloads (including multiple versions) #37828
  • NETSDK1206 and library projects #37826
  • UX when specifying a PublishProfile that does not exist. #37822

Closed

  • Containers: detection of port config should prefer ASPNETCORE_URLS #35845
    8.0.2xx
  • Container tooling doesn't understand the rtm channel #35647
  • TaskCanceledException: A task was canceled. hitting ctrl-c during container create #36593
  • Question: is there a way to get the CLR runtime info #37813

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable env var directives in the .NET CLI #37827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove all sdks when switching branches #37824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #37782
    Servicing-approved
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format
  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI
